Business records include essentially everything that you produce as an employee, regardless of its format. A business record may be in the form of paper, computer data, image, email or voice record. Letters, memos and contracts are obviously business records as are things such as desk calendar, an appointment book or an expense record. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our company's books and records must be accurate and complete. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are required by law to keep certain types of business records for specified minimum period of time. The failure to keep these records and provide them to authorities upon request could subject us to penalties, fines or other sanctions or could put us at a serious disadvantage at court. Accordingly we have established policies and guidelines to help you understand what records to keep, for how long, what records to dispose of, and how to dispose of them. If you are unsure how our policies apply to any records you work with, please seek guidance from your manager.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a public company, i.e. its shares are traded on stock exchange. For this reason, EPAM management is responsible to maintain the system of internal controls to ensure that EPAM's assets are safeguarded, transactions conform to management's authorizations, and financial records are compliant with accounting, legal, tax and other requirements. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please make sure that before making any business commitments on behalf of the Company you get appropriate authorizations to do so and that you disclose all such commitments or changes to such commitments in appropriate way. When you become aware of non-standard operations such as acceleration or deferral of revenue or expenses to achieve required financial result, inform Company's Compliance Officer about it. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please also read the abstract on business records from the Code of Conduct:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c. Accuracy of Books & Records\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's books and records must be accurate and complete. EPAM maintains a system of internal accounting controls to ensure that assets are safeguarded, transactions conform to management's authorizations, and accounting records are accurate and compliant with legal, accounting, tax and other requirements.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's internal controls must be followed:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take reasonable steps to ensure that those portions of EPAM's books, records and accounts for which you have responsibility are valid, complete, accurate and supported by appropriate and verifiable documentation,\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never falsify any record, account or report,\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never interfere with any audit, and \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Report the existence of any known false reports or suspected incorrect entries in EPAM's accounting records to the Company's General Counsel.  \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d. Signing Contracts & Making EPAM Commitments \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Signing contracts or making any authority for approvals or signature, ask your manager.  Never sign any documents you believe are inaccurate, untruthful, or for which you do not have signature authority.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e. No Side Deals\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Side deals, whether or not in writing, that change any contract terms or create an unwritten binding commitment can impact EPAM's revenue recognition and financial reporting.  Make sure that all EPAM commitments you make are accurately reflected in appropriate contract documentation and reported.  If you become aware of any side deals or other undocumented contract terms, promptly inform the CFO.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f. Timing & Non-Standard Matters\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When recording EPAM transactions, record revenue in accordance with EPAM's revenue recognition requirements.  Do not engage in any improper acceleration or deferral of revenue or expenses to achieve financial results or goals or to achieve personal performance targets or goals.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are expected to report to the Company's Compliance Officer upon becoming aware of any:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Off-balance sheet transactions, arrangements, obligations (contingent or otherwise), \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relationships with unconsolidated entities or persons (that may have a material current or future effect on financial condition or results of operations).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g. Record Retention\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Certain types of records (whether hardcopy or electronic) are to be retained for specific periods of time, due to legal requirements, client requirements or other business or financial requirements.  After the retention period expires, or if there was no retention requirement for the record, the record should be routinely disposed of in the normal course of business.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you become aware of a particular actual or potential lawsuit, governmental investigation or audit, you must cease all disposal and preserve all related records.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"h.  Quality of Public Disclosures\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has a responsibility to provide full and accurate information in its public disclosures, in all material respects, about EPAM's financial conditions and results of operations and for the disclosures to contain no false or materially misleading information or omissions.  EPAM is committed to complying with all disclosure Laws and applicable accounting standards required for fair and timely disclosures of material information and the accuracy of all publicly released information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VI. Conclusion\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Be guided by the Code. Use good judgment. Never hesitate to ask for help from your manager, the Compliance Officer or EPAM's Hotline.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VII. Waivers and Amendments\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any waiver of the provisions of this Code for executive officers or directors may only be granted by the Board of Directors or a standing committee of the Board and will be promptly disclosed to EPAM's shareholders.  Any waiver of the provisions of this Code for other employees may only be granted by the Compliance Officer.  Amendments to this Code must be approved by the Board of Directors, and will also be promptly disclosed to EPAM's shareholders. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
